name: Oblivion Wing
summary: Does damage to the opposing pokemon and restores the users HP by 75% of damage dealt. If the attacking pokemon is holding Big Root, HP is incresed by an additional 30% but does not increase damage dealt.
viability: This is Yveltal's signature move, and a good one at that. With 80 power and 75% HP recovery, this move is an obvious choice for any Yveltal set.
